projects.title: The Creaks - Digital HQ
projects.description: Built the central hub for Prague's alt-rock rebels, The Creaks. This isn't just a website—it's mission control for their fanbase. From Instagram to merch drops, gig bookings to email signups, everything flows through here. React.js powered, community approved: 2,000+ visitors in month one.

projects.title: Bell Hat Games - Playful Digital Worlds
projects.description: A comprehensive website for Bell Hat Games, an indie studio developing games for children with ADHD. The site acts as a welcoming portal for parents and children, designed to be engaging, informative, and to drive game sales. It features a full-fledged CMS (built on Squarespace) for easy content management and future blogging capabilities.

projects.title: SetListGo - Musician's Best Friend
projects.description: Every gigging musician knows the struggle: scribbled setlists, last-minute changes, sharing with bandmates. SetListGo solves all that. A clean, mobile-first web app that lets artists create, manage, and share setlists on the fly. React.js meets real-world problem solving.

about.image_alt: Hugh Doriello, the creative mind behind Oriello, in his element—part developer, part artist.
about.heading: I'm Hugh—developer, designer, and occasional perfectionist.
about.p1: I've spent years building websites for businesses that care about how they're represented online. Most developers treat every project the same way—but your coffee shop isn't the same as a law firm, and your boutique isn't the same as a tech startup.
about.p2: I take time to understand what makes your business unique, then build something that actually reflects that. Whether you need to showcase products, take bookings, build a community, or just look professional online, I'll make sure it works perfectly for your specific needs.

testimonials.quote: They just get the creative process. Communication was effortless, and the final site perfectly captures what we're about.
